caster:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
caster:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lightning. NL Deal !D! damage.

caster:FlashFrost.NAME: Flash Frost
caster:FlashFrost.DESCRIPTION: Frost. NL Apply !M! Frozen. NL Exhaust.

caster:JupitelThunder.NAME: Jupitel Thunder
caster:JupitelThunder.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lightning. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

caster:FrostDriver.NAME: Frost Driver
caster:FrostDriver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Frost. NL Deal !D! damage.

caster:MagicResonance.NAME: Magic Resonance
caster:MagicResonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each spell you are currently casting.

caster:MagicAttunement.NAME: Magic Attunement
caster:MagicAttunement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Soul_Strike to your hand.

caster:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
caster:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Neutral. NL Deal !D! damage.

caster:Fissure.NAME: Fissure
caster:Fissure.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Earth. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL Apply !M! Stun to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
caster:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

caster:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
caster:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

caster:LordOfVermillion.NAME: Lord Of Vermillion
caster:LordOfVermillion.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M!*X times.

caster:MeteorStorm.NAME: Meteor Storm
caster:MeteorStorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! zero cost Meteors into your draw pile.

caster:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
caster:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the Cast_Time of a random card in your hand by 1.
caster:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the Cast_Time of 2 random cards in your hand by 1.

caster:QuickCast.NAME: Quick Cast
caster:QuickCast.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Cast_time of a random spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.
caster:QuickCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Cast_time of a spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.

caster:WallOfThorns.NAME: Wall Of Thorns
caster:WallOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Cast_time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !B! Block twice and !M! Thorns.

caster:DivertFocus.NAME: Divert Focus
caster:DivertFocus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! to the Cast_time of your casted Spells with the current lowest Cast_time.

caster:BookThrow.NAME: Book Throw
caster:BookThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn.

caster:Meteor.NAME: Meteor
caster:Meteor.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Neutral. NL Deal !D! damage.

caster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
caster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

caster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
caster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
caster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

caster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
caster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

caster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
caster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !caster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)
